chat.title: How can I help you?
chat.no_messages: No messages yet. Type your medical query here.
chat.placeholder: Ask me about symptoms, treatments, or diagnoses...

home.title: MedScope
home.description: An experimental AI-powered platform for early disease detection through advanced medical imaging and machine learning.

upload.title: Upload Medical Image
upload.desc: Submit a high-resolution medical scan for AI-driven analysis.

analysis.title: AI-Powered Diagnosis
analysis.desc: Our advanced deep learning model processes the scan to detect potential abnormalities.

results.title: Detailed Insights
results.desc: Receive an AI-generated report with probability scores and preliminary diagnostic insights.

footer.description: AI-powered medical imaging analysis for early disease detection.
footer.disclaimer: This tool is for research and educational purposes only and does not replace professional medical diagnosis.

upload.title: MedScope AI Analysis
upload.description: Upload a medical scan or capture one with your camera. Our AI will analyze it for potential indicators.

dataset.title: Dataset & AI Model
dataset.description: MedScope utilizes high-quality medical imaging datasets for disease detection research.

model.title: AI Model
model.description: The model is optimized with deep learning techniques, including transfer learning and advanced preprocessing.

github.title: GitHub Repository
github.description: Access the source code, scripts, and documentation. Feel free to explore or contribute.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: If you have any inquiries or would like to collaborate, feel free to reach out via WhatsApp, email, or connect through GitHub and LinkedIn.

form.title: Send a Message
form.error: Please fill in both fields before sending.

uploaddicom.title: Upload MRI Scan
uploaddicom.description: Upload an MRI scan in NIfTI (.nii, .nii.gz) or DICOM (.dcm) format. The AI model will analyze it.
uploaddicom.drag_drop: Drag & drop an MRI scan (.nii, .nii.gz, .dcm) or click to select
uploaddicom.invalid_file: Invalid file type. Please upload a NIfTI (.nii, .nii.gz) or DICOM (.dcm) file.
uploaddicom.invalid_nifti: Invalid NIfTI file. Please check the format.

about.title: About MedScope
about.image_alt: Medical scan representing AI-powered disease detection
about.description_1: This AI-powered project focuses on analyzing medical scans to assist in disease research and early detection.
about.description_2: Using deep learning, the system identifies patterns that may contribute to advancements in radiology and medical imaging.
about.disclaimer: This system is not a diagnostic tool. Consult a medical professional for health concerns.

research.title: Ongoing Research
research.desc: This project is in continuous development, improving AI accuracy.

analysis.title: AI-Assisted Analysis
analysis.desc: MedScope explores AI's role in medical imaging but is not a medical device.

experimental.title: Experimental Model
experimental.desc: Still under testing. Not for clinical use. Consult a doctor for any symptoms.

consultation.title: Professional Consultation
consultation.desc: For an accurate diagnosis, seek a certified medical professional.
